question: GI Genius is an AI assisted _____ tool which is designed to detect polyps.
Viz.ai's AI products can detect issues and notify _____ teams quickly, enabling providers to discuss options, provide faster treatment decisions, thus saving lives.
BioXcel Therapeutics, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company utilizing artificial intelligence to develop transformative medicines in _________.
PathAI is the only AI-focused technology company with comprehensive precision ______ solutions
Activ Surgical completed the world’s first autonomous ______ surgery of soft tissue in 2018.
Butterfly Network revolutionizes medical imaging by creating the first hand-held whole-body _______ imager, paired with AI technology.
Cleerly's AI-based platform aids in diagnosing and treating ____ disease earlier by analyzing and characterizing plaque buildup.
A form of AI known as Convolutional neural network has been shown to outperform experienced doctors in detecting ______ cancer, especially malignant melanomas.
An AI framework developed by researchers aids in detecting errors in medication administration using devices such as _____ for patients with lung diseases.
Johnson & Johnson MedTech is using AI in the development of their Monarch™ Platform for _______________
MIT group's ML algorithm contributes to the identification of cardiomegaly in chest X-rays found _____ approach gives the best result.

AI-powered chatbots are becoming increasingly common in healthcare for patient interactions. What is the term for these chatbots that assist patients in scheduling appointments and providing medical information?
What can the AI system developed by researchers at Moorfields Eye Hospital and UCL Institute of Ophthalmology potentially predict, besides sight-threatening eye diseases?
